author: razor
name: Spearmint
description:
To add this theme just extract the zip and place the Spearmint file in either "~/.themes/" or "/.usr/share/themes/"

Change list:

V 2.2

 - new on/off buttons

 - new calendar arrows

 - minor changes

V 2.1

- added a shadow to the scrollbar in the main menu

- alt tab is darker and removed transparency

- made colors more consistent

 

V 2.0

- border around window list

- popup menu is slightly darker

- menu is slightly smaller(see pic)

- popup menu hover now has a border and shadow

 - hovering on the panel now shows a border

-------
